attributes.action: stop the senless changes in benefit payments
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
stop the sensless changing of benefit payments ,we are paid carers allowance for our son and struggle now ,you 
have now decided to ruin our lives even further by forcing us to struggle even more financially,why,(why fix it when it aint broke?),you just seem to enjoy causing stress and have now lost my familys votes.
